Title: The harder the work, the more hardworking and thrifty
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Small print version of the poster The harder the work, the more hardworking and thrifty.From portfolio 户县农民画 (Huxian peasant painting), Shanghai renmin chubanshe, May 1974 (This print is from the third edition, August 1974).
